Career Profile

With a great flair for financial markets, proven record in Information Technology and strong analytical skills, I am an ambitious team player who enjoys solving complex problems.

Experiences

Quantitative Developer

July 2016 - Present
Project-based work

Offer various services to clients in the financial industry.

  • January 2018 - today: Fisch Asset Management AG as quantitative developer, implementing an enterprise-level server-side R environment, build a portfolio analytics system for the Multi Asset portfolio managers to allow multi-dimensional analysis of portfolios and research projects (portfolio optimization, fit covariance matrices, etc.). Furthermore, introduction of a generic platform for automation of R scripts (without professional versions of RStudio products) and a variety of Shiny Apps to control the functionalities of the R environment with a GUI.
  • January 2017 - December 2017: DDM AG as quantitative analyst, standardization/automation of parts of the investment analysis process and developing and extending the existing server-side R environment.
  • Older: Two research projects together with the ZHAW, general IT Support and website development.

Project Manager Business Intelligence (80%)

February 2014 – February 2016
Bouygues E&S FM Schweiz AG in Zurich, Switzerland

Build the Business Intelligence environment: Conception and implementation of ETL processes and a Data Warehouse solution. Extend existing operative reporting and integration into the BI environment. Build standard reports for clients, energy consumption and QM reports as well as various ad-hoc analysis. Development of various Excel VBA applications.

Business Intelligence Analyst (80%)

July 2013 – January 2014
Bank Frey & Co. AG in Zurich, Switzerland

Management, compliance and quality management reporting. Develop and maintain the central Data Warehouse and ETL process as well as various tasks in the core-banking system. As a part of the Business Intelligence team, being the central contact for all teams when it comes to reporting and data analytics topics.
